#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int checkpal(long long int n)
 {
  long long int r,num=0,x=n;
  while(n>0)
   {
    r=n%10;
    num=num*10+r;
    n=n/10;
   }
  if(x==num)
   return 1;
  else
   return 0;  
 }
long long int rev(long long int n)
 {
  long long int r,num=0;
  while(n>0)
   {
    r=n%10;
    num=num*10+r;
    n=n/10;
   }
  return num; 
 }
int main()
 {
  int t;
  cin>>t;
  while(t--)
   {
    int k=0;
    long long int n;
    long long int pal;
    cin>>n;
    while(!checkpal(n))
     {
      k++;
      n=n+rev(n);
     }
    cout<<k<<" "<<n<<endl; 
   }
  return 0;
 }
